::Cleder/Rixer/Forrior/Blyer/Firearm/Hot Rod::

Forrior is blasted back by the missile, and takes a minute regaining his
composure. Rixer, Cleder, Blyer, and Firearm close in on all side of
McGowan. The each shoot 2 shots.(8 shots)

Hot Rod jumps back avoiding the blade, the allows the missile from
McGowan to miss. Hot Rod then ducks underneith the blade, coming up with
a uppercut to Depp's mid section.
